I successfully completed the ultimate task of leaving the comment 'Unforgettable!' under a video on a streaming platform. To accomplish this, I first had to create an account with the details: Full Name: 'John Smith', Username: 'JohnSmith123', Email: 'johnsmith123@example.com', and Password: 'Password123!'. After successfully registering, I returned to the comment section of the video titled 'When the City Sleeps | Night Walk Through an Empty World' by @afterhours.cities. I typed 'Unforgettable!' in the comment field and clicked the Submit button to post the comment. The comment was successfully posted under the video, thus completing the requested task.
